name: Victorious Boxers 2: Victorious Road
description:
Hajime no Ippo 2: Victorious Road (はじめの一歩２　ＶＩＣＴＯＲＩＯＵＳ　ＲＯＡＤ) is a Boxing video game published by ESP Software released on January 29th, 2004 for the PlayStation 2.
ESP's boxing sequel to their famous fighting series based on the popular manga and anime. The follow-up to Victorious Boxers features a new "coach" fighter-creation mode and a whole training gym's worth of new moves and boxers.
